home.subtitle: Since 1969, high-quality PET bottles, plastic bottles, spray packaging, pumps, and caps for the cosmetics sector. Custom design and wholesale solutions at your service.
home.categoriesSubtitle: Discover our high-quality cosmetic packaging solutions for every sector. From standard products to custom design.
home.whyUsSubtitle: The values and advantages behind our position among the industry's leading companies.
home.aboutLead1: Since 1969, Kısmet Plastik has been offering quality and trust in cosmetic packaging production. With our wide product range, we can meet all the needs of the cosmetics sector.
home.aboutLead2: We serve our B2B customers with many cosmetic packaging solutions including PET bottles, plastic bottles, cologne bottles, spray packaging, room fragrance bottles, liquid soap bottles and caps.
home.sectorsSubtitle: We offer standards-compliant cosmetic packaging solutions tailored to different sector needs.
home.ctaSubtitle: Contact us for cosmetic packaging solutions that meet your needs. Our expert team will offer you the best solution.

homeFeatures.modernFactoryDesc: High-capacity production at our facility equipped with state-of-the-art machinery.
homeFeatures.qualityAssuranceDesc: Production to international quality standards with ISO 9001, ISO 22000 and FSSC 22000 certifications.
homeFeatures.ecoFriendlyDesc: Environmentally conscious approach with recyclable materials and sustainable production processes.
homeFeatures.fastDeliveryDesc: On-time delivery of your orders with our fast and secure nationwide logistics network.
homeFeatures.highCapacityDesc: We meet large-scale orders with monthly production capacity in the millions.
homeFeatures.supportDesc: Our expert team is with you at every stage, before and after sales.

homeStrengths: 55+ years of expertise in cosmetic sector since 1969
Mold design and custom production capability
Competitive pricing and flexible payment options

homeCategories.name: PET Bottles
homeCategories.description: PET bottles in various volumes and designs for cosmetics, cologne and personal care products.

homeCategories.name: Plastic Bottles
homeCategories.description: Durable plastic bottle varieties made from HDPE, PP and LDPE materials.

homeCategories.name: Caps
homeCategories.description: Screw, flip-top and custom design cap varieties.

homeCategories.name: Stoppers
homeCategories.description: Inner stoppers, dropper stoppers and sealing plugs.

homeCategories.name: Finger Sprays
homeCategories.description: Finger spray mechanisms for cosmetics and cologne products.

homeCategories.name: Pumps
homeCategories.description: Lotion pumps, foam pumps and cream dispensing pumps.

homeCategories.name: Trigger Sprayers
homeCategories.description: Trigger spray systems for cleaning and care products.

homeCategories.name: Funnels
homeCategories.description: Plastic funnels used in filling processes.

homeSectors.name: Cosmetics & Beauty
homeSectors.description: Aesthetically designed packaging for shampoo, lotion, cream, perfume and makeup products.

homeSectors.name: Cologne & Perfumery
homeSectors.description: Custom-designed bottle solutions for cologne, room fragrance and scent products.

homeSectors.name: Personal Care
homeSectors.description: Modern designs for body care, hair care, skin care and hygiene products.

homeSectors.name: Cleaning & Hygiene
homeSectors.description: Durable packaging solutions for liquid soap, hand sanitizer and cleaning products.

homeSectors.name: Hospitality & HoReCa
homeSectors.description: Mini-size and custom packaging solutions for hotels, restaurants and cafes.

homeSectors.name: Custom Molding
homeSectors.description: Custom mold design and personalized cosmetic packaging production for brands.

products.title: All Products
products.subtitle: Browse our PET bottles, plastic bottles, cologne bottles, spray packaging, room fragrance bottles, liquid soap bottles and caps. Use filters and search to easily find the product that suits your needs.

about.heroSubtitle: The address of quality and trust with over 55 years of experience in the cosmetic packaging sector.
about.storyTitle: The Name You Trust in Cosmetic Packaging
about.storyP1: Kısmet Plastik was founded in 1969 in the Vefa district of Fatih, İstanbul, focusing on cosmetic packaging production. Today, we are proud to be one of Turkey's leading cosmetic packaging manufacturers.
about.storyP2: With over 55 years of experience, we focus on providing our customers with the highest quality cosmetic packaging products at the most affordable cost, always using the latest technology. We continue to make a difference in the sector with our honest and dynamic work approach, keeping customer satisfaction above all.
about.missionText: To best meet the needs and expectations of cosmetic brands, to offer the highest quality cosmetic packaging products at the most affordable cost using the latest technology, and to embrace continuous development and innovation.
about.visionText: To be Turkey's leading organization in the cosmetic packaging sector, to become an important player in the international market, and to contribute to a sustainable future.
about.valueQualityDesc: Production to international standards with ISO 9001, ISO 22000 and FSSC 22000 certifications.
about.valueSustainabilityDesc: Recyclable materials and environmentally conscious production processes.
about.valueInnovationDesc: State-of-the-art machinery and constantly evolving product portfolio.
about.valueCustomerDesc: Pre and post-sales technical support, custom design and flexible solutions.
about.certsSubtitle: We produce in compliance with international quality and cosmetic safety standards.

quality.heroSubtitle: We produce to international standards and guarantee quality at every stage.
quality.certsSubtitle: All our production processes are certified in compliance with international standards.
quality.processSubtitle: We apply rigorous quality control processes at every stage from raw materials to shipment.
quality.step1Desc: All raw materials from suppliers undergo laboratory testing.
quality.step2Desc: Quality parameters are continuously monitored and recorded at every production stage.
quality.step3Desc: Finished products undergo pressure, leak, dimensional and visual tests.
quality.step4Desc: Final quality control before packaging, shipped under appropriate conditions.
quality.labDesc: We guarantee the quality and safety of our products through tests conducted in our modern laboratory.

quote.benefitFastDesc: We respond quickly to your quote requests.
quote.benefitConsultDesc: Get technical support from our expert team.
quote.benefitDeliveryDesc: Fast shipping with nationwide logistics network.

dealer.benefitsDesc: Grow your business with exclusive benefits. We are with you with strong brand support, competitive pricing and comprehensive product range.

testimonials.text: We have been working with Kısmet Plastik for 5 years. Product quality and delivery times have always exceeded our expectations.

testimonials.name: Ayşe Demir

testimonials.text: ISO certified production processes and cosmetic compliance tests were our most important criteria. Kısmet Plastik excels in this area.
